title: Girl Dress Up
description: Girl Dress Up is a beauty game with various fashion clothes and makeup. Dressup girl model with the most stylish clothes for a date, college, shopping, or a fashion show! Choose the color of her skin, eyes, eyebrows, as well as makeup like eye shadow, lipstick, and blush. Start dressing up with many clothing items for outfit design. Get stylish looks for any occasion from crazy shopping, a college date, or a star party. You can also choose backgrounds like a mall, bedroom, park, etc. Take screenshots and share them with your friends!
